body:
> and cant log in

Well, congratulations, it looks like you're the most recent person to be *permanently* kicked off of reddit for ever and ever! Only a handful of people have ever gotten that kind of a ban. Welcome to the club!

I'm not sure why the admins would've done that to you, based on what you've said, but they can just target seemingly random people sometimes.
body_html:
and cant log in

Well, congratulations, it looks like you're the most recent person to be permanently kicked off of reddit for ever and ever! Only a handful of people have ever gotten that kind of a ban. Welcome to the club!

I'm not sure why the admins would've done that to you, based on what you've said, but they can just target seemingly random people sometimes.

body:
i got a permaban from reddit for telling a mod to "eat a dick." The mod originally banned me for saying "BLM is a Marxist organization". Their founder has openly admitted she is Marxist and that the organization was formed in that mold; they receive funding from a CCP subsidiary.

If I could log in id tell the admin who perma-banned me to eat a dick too. The place is garbage now.

body:
I got a temp-ban for a week for saying ‚ÄúBuy the dip faggot‚Äù.

It‚Äôs a r/wallstreetbets meme.

(On a side note, I do kinda hate how that subreddit has been toned-down a lot in the past 2 years or so, now it‚Äôs flooded with stock newbies who don‚Äôt truly want to know how to get the holy tendies. I prefer /biz/ now solely because of how anarchic it is. Still a üêªüåà for life tho)

body:
Yeah like half the fun of wsb was reveling in how fucking retarded we all were. The troll box on bitmex represents the epitome of what it meant to be a millennial trader. Just fucking yolo‚Äôing into a $10million sell wall with zero reason other than because you‚Äôre drunk and the chat went wild, and sure as shit the wall gets vaporized in 15 seconds and the price skyrockets $500 in 2 min. No better shit in the world. 

Now I bet you would get banned for saying retard. It‚Äôs completely ruined the culture. It was never meant to be serious.

body: IDK why they would, I'm the one (ashamedly) who is jealous of people's coding abilities. And I'm not a reddit admin, I actually got the ultra-permanent ban with the password change twice now (in fact I believe I'm the only one to date who's had it more than once, probably because I made too many posts about the forbidden DefaultMods slack with the admins).

author.bio:
The world is a crazy, wonderful place to create any kind of experience you want.

Seems best tho, if you don't want to get hurt.. to listen to God, listen to your heart, and do what is right, always.

body:
life is what you make of it.

dream of how you'd like things to be..

and step into your dream.

https://freeneville.com/

https://www.youtube.com/user/AbrahamHicks

nobody would choose this current bullshit, except assholes that conned us but don't believe it.

or crazy people that conned normal people into being retarded.

anyone that interferes with the crazy people conning the retarded people..

gets banned.  guess they are a self selecting group that remain, innocent of war around them.

funning that.  silly fuckers, tricks are for kids.
